name: JavaScript
Get Server Time
func:
msg.payload['serverTime'] = new Date().getTime();
return msg;

name: Set Server Time
func: return {topic : 'setServerTime', payload: msg.payload.serverTime, userID: msg.payload.userID};

name: Set Time Sync Completed
func:
global.set('systemClockSynchronized', true);
return {topic:'timeInfo',payload:{topic : 'setServerTime', payload: {} , userID: msg.userID}};

name: Find Device Type
Create r3-rfct Database entry
Create r3-osc-over Database entry
Create mode-0-damper Database entry
func:
var device = 
{
    name         : 'r3',
    deviceType   : "mode-0-damper",
    arcPeriod    : 60000,
    timeStamp    : 0,
    lastArchive  : 0,
    linkQuality  : { action : 'reading', type : 'scalar',    value : 0,      unit : '/70',     alarm : {value : 0, limits: {lolo :  30,  low : 40,     high : 71,       hihi : 80   }, notify:{name:'', number:'', time:0} } },
    signalLevel  : { action : 'reading', type : 'scalar',    value : 0,      unit : 'dBm',     alarm : {value : 0, limits: {lolo : -70,  low : -60,    high : 0,        hihi : 30   }, notify:{name:'', number:'', time:0} } },
    maxAcDipole  : { action : 'setting', type : 'scalar',    value : 50,     unit : 'unit',    alarm : {value : 0, limits: {lolo : 0,    low : 0,    high : 1024,    hihi : 1024}, notify:{name:'', number:'', time:0} } },
    maxAcQuad    : { action : 'setting', type : 'scalar',    value : 50,     unit : 'unit',    alarm : {value : 0, limits: {lolo : 0,    low : 0,    high : 1024,    hihi : 1024}, notify:{name:'', number:'', time:0} } },
    offsetDipole : { action : 'setting', type : 'scalar',    value : 555,    unit : 'unit',    alarm : {value : 0, limits: {lolo : 0,    low : 0,    high : 1024,    hihi : 1024}, notify:{name:'', number:'', time:0} } },
    offsetQuad   : { action : 'setting', type : 'scalar',    value : 455,    unit : 'unit',    alarm : {value : 0, limits: {lolo : 0,    low : 0,    high : 1024,    hihi : 1024}, notify:{name:'', number:'', time:0} } },
    onDipole     : { action : 'setting', type : 'scalar',    value : 1,      unit : 'unit',    alarm : {value : 0, limits: {lolo : -1,   low : -1,   high : 2,       hihi : 2   }, notify:{name:'', number:'', time:0} } },
    onQuad       : { action : 'setting', type : 'scalar',    value : 0,      unit : 'unit',    alarm : {value : 0, limits: {lolo : -1,   low : -1,   high : 2,       hihi : 2   }, notify:{name:'', number:'', time:0} } },
    signDipole   : { action : 'setting', type : 'scalar',    value : 1,      unit : 'unit',    alarm : {value : 0, limits: {lolo : -2,   low : -2,   high : 2,       hihi : 2   }, notify:{name:'', number:'', time:0} } },
    signQuad     : { action : 'setting', type : 'scalar',    value : -1,     unit : 'unit',    alarm : {value : 0, limits: {lolo : -2,   low : -2,   high : 2,       hihi : 2   }, notify:{name:'', number:'', time:0} } },
    gainDipole   : { action : 'setting', type : 'scalar',    value : 2,      unit : 'unit',    alarm : {value : 0, limits: {lolo : -8,   low : -8,   high : 8,       hihi : 8   }, notify:{name:'', number:'', time:0} } },
    gainQuad     : { action : 'setting', type : 'scalar',    value : 1,      unit : 'unit',    alarm : {value : 0, limits: {lolo : -8,   low : -8,   high : 8,       hihi : 8   }, notify:{name:'', number:'', time:0} } },
    filterDipole : { action : 'setting', type : 'scalar',    value : 18,     unit : 'unit',    alarm : {value : 0, limits: {lolo : 1,    low : 1,    high : 20,      hihi : 20  }, notify:{name:'', number:'', time:0} } },
    filterQuad   : { action : 'setting', type : 'scalar',    value : 9,      unit : 'unit',    alarm : {value : 0, limits: {lolo : 1,    low : 1,    high : 20,      hihi : 20  }, notify:{name:'', number:'', time:0} } },
};
return {topic:'mode-0-damper',payload:device};
